name: BloodyLines
description:
A top down shooter endless boss fight against dracula, who is trying to escape by every means available, even if it means using it's own toxic blood to overwhelm you.

Use WSAD to move the hunter and mouse to aim and shoot at the fiend!

Beware of the blood it spews, it's highly lethal for humans.

This game was made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 118, by ARealBigMountain, Fabled, NightWanderer98 and T0neLY. It was our first gamejam and it has been a pleasure.
